artist: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully
title: No. 41: Ludovicus Dionisius Lalive de Bellegarde, from a recueil of etchings
marks:
Signature

 LLC, in the plate: [Rigaud pinxit]; LRC, in the pl
description: portrait of a man wearing a long, curly powdered wig and generous flowering garment, surrounded by a cartouche with name; inscription below cartouche
